channel.title: Pages on Kale Stahl's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Kale Stahl's Personal Website

item.title: A Beginner's Guide to the Sun \& Moon through Lost Thunder Format
item.description: Table of Contents 1: An Introduction to SUM-LOT 2: Important Cards Supporters Items Stadiums Pokemon 3: An Overview of the Metagame 4: Decklists An Introduction to SUM-LOT The Sun and Moon era of the Pokemon TCG is looked back on extremely fondly by competitively players, and rightly so. After the dominance of big-basic strategies in the Black and White era, and them continuing into XY due to the lackluster Mega Evolution mechanic, it was exciting to see the evolving Pokemon GX take over the reigns.

item.title: Some Thoughts on Video Games I've Played in 2025
item.description: Table of Contents Monster Hunter Wilds Baldur’s Gate III Fantasy Life i: The Girl who Steals Time Turnip Boy Robs a Bank Mario Kart World Donkey Kong Bananza Hollow Knight: Silksong Pokemon Legends Z-A Super Mario RPG Monster Sanctuary Persona 4 Golden Kirby Air Riders Monster Hunter Wilds First Played: 2/28/2025 Play Time so Far: 24 hours Overall Review Score: 4/7 This section may turn into a rant, but it’s whatever.
